values: It Is Right to Live for Maximum PleasureIt Is Right to Live for Maximum Pleasure

The greatest benefits of the cross, like justification, propitiations, salvation, and redemption, are all a means to us enjoying the one greatest benefit: glorifying God by enjoying him forever.
